books.author: Gillian Flynn
books.description: A gripping psychological thriller about a woman's sudden disappearance and the dark secrets that surface.
books.title: Gone Girl

books.author: Stieg Larsson
books.description: A journalist and a hacker team up to investigate a decades-old disappearance, uncovering corruption and murder in the process.
books.title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo

books.author: Dan Brown
books.description: A professor and a cryptologist unravel a complex code that leads them on a quest to uncover a religious mystery.
books.title: The Da Vinci Code

books.author: Thomas Harris
books.description: An FBI agent consults with a brilliant but insane serial killer to solve a series of gruesome murders.
books.title: The Silence of the Lambs

books.author: Arthur Conan Doyle
books.description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson investigate a legendary supernatural hound that haunts the Baskerville family.
books.title: The Hound of the Baskervilles

books.author: Tana French
books.description: A detective confronts a traumatic event from his childhood when a young girl's murder in the same woods reopens old wounds.
books.title: In the Woods

books.author: Agatha Christie
books.description: Hercule Poirot must solve a murder mystery on a luxurious train journey.
books.title: Murder on the Orient Express

books.author: Dashiell Hammett
books.description: Private detective Sam Spade becomes entangled in a hunt for a priceless statue.
books.title: The Maltese Falcon

books.author: Donna Tartt
books.description: A group of classics students becomes embroiled in a murder mystery within their own ranks.
books.title: The Secret History

books.author: Robert Galbraith (pseudonym for J.K. Rowling)
books.description: Private investigator Cormoran Strike delves into the suicide of a supermodel, only to uncover a complex murder.
books.title: The Cuckoo's Calling

books.author: Gillian Flynn
books.description: Libby Day revisits her family's gruesome murder in a quest for the truth about what happened that night.
books.title: Dark Places

books.author: Michael Connelly
books.description: Defense attorney Mickey Haller faces a challenging case as he switches to the other side of the courtroom.
books.title: The Reversal

books.author: Alexander McCall Smith
books.description: Precious Ramotswe opens Botswana's first female detective agency, solving cases with wit and wisdom.
books.title: The No. 1 Ladies' Detective Agency

books.author: Louise Penny
books.description: Chief Inspector Armand Gamache investigates a suspicious death in a tranquil village with hidden secrets.
books.title: Still Life

books.author: Agatha Christie
books.description: A classic mystery novel where ten strangers are lured to an island and accused of past crimes.
books.title: And Then There Were None

books.author: Harlan Coben
books.description: A man's life is turned upside down when he discovers his wife's secret past.
books.title: Tell No One

books.author: Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller where a woman becomes obsessed with a couple she watches from the train every day.
books.title: The Girl on the Train

books.author: Ruth Ware
books.description: A murder mystery set on a luxury cruise ship where everyone is a suspect.
books.title: The Woman in Cabin 10

books.author: B.A. Paris
books.description: A gripping psychological thriller where a woman's life takes a dark turn on her honeymoon.
books.title: Behind Closed Doors

books.author: Agatha Christie
books.description: Miss Marple investigates a murder at an English country estate.
books.title: The Murder at the Vicarage
